steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on button_object --> navigate to Page_integrations
step 5: At Page_integrations click on hyperlink_test_design_test_cases --> navigate to Page_test-design_test-cases
step 6: At Page_test-design_test-cases click on hyperlink_test_planning --> navigate to Page_test-planning
step 7: At Page_test-planning click on hyperlink_menu_reports --> navigate to Page_overview
step 8: At Page_overview click on hyperlink_test_reports_test_maintenance_active --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active
step 9: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on button_object
step 10: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on button_object
step 11: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_active click on hyperlink_test_reports_test_maintenance_platform_s --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_platform-statistics
step 12: At Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_platform-statistics click on hyperlink_test_reports_test_maintenance_flakiness_ --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-maintenance_flakiness-report
